actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ningyo makes four barbed tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Barbed Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Aquatic
special_abilities.desc: The ningyo can breathe only underwater and can hold its breath for 1 hour.

special_abilities.name: Curse of Ill Fortune
special_abilities.desc: When a creature that the ningyo can see attacks the ningyo and misses, the attack is automatically redirected against another creature within 5 feet of the ningyo or the attacker. This attack uses the same attack roll.
